episode_event_sub_ep_anniversary_2021/40: Wow, your Reshiram is gorgeous, N!
It’s so cool! You two look awesome together!
Thanks! I couldn’t be happier.

They say that Reshiram helps those who want to
build a world of truth, right?
No wonder you two make such a great team!

We want to help you turn your dream into a
reality, too!

And maybe...if we try really hard, we can even
turn Ghetsis around one day.
Perhaps... But I’m my own person, and so is he.

We both think very differently. Our goals are not
the same.

However...I’d like to wish for everyone to be
happy, regardless of who they are or where
they’re from.

That’s the kind of love I’m capable of as a
human being.

You’re such a kindhearted person, N.
You really understand the power of truth!
Thank you for saying that.

If that’s true, then I owe a lot to the people and
Pokémon I met back in Unova and here on Pasio.
They helped me become who I am today.
You think so, too, Reshiram?
I’m not alone. I have friends.
Those Pokémon...

They look just like the statues at the Parfum Palace
back in Kalos!
You’re right. How very intriguing!
Are you curious about Reshiram and Zekrom?

Yeah! We have statues of both of them in the
Kalos region.

It is said that Reshiram and Zekrom were involved
in Unova’s creation...

whereas Xerneas and Yveltal are said to have had
a hand in Kalos’s destruction.

Two regions—each with two Legendary Pokémon
that played a huge role in their region’s history...

It sounds like the myths of our homelands share
quite a few similarities.
Good observation! You’re a clever one, aren’t you!

I think it would be interesting to investigate how
the myths of Unova made it over to Kalos in the
first place.

I’d be curious to see how the tale of these two
made it all the way there as well.

Maybe Reshiram, Zekrom, and I will have to pay
Kalos a visit sometime.
Lunala is a moon Pokémon, isn’t it?

When it spreads its wings, they almost look like
crescent moons. It’s so pretty!

Lunatone is shaped like a crescent moon, too!
How adorable!
Aww! Look how happy it looks!

Maybe it likes the way Lunala made a circle with
its wings.

Lunatone is always full of energy when the moon
is at its fullest!

Do you think Lunatone may have mistaken my
Lunala for the real moon? That’s so cute.

I bet the two of them would make the best of
friends. Moon Pokémon are bound to get along
with each other, right?

I think so! They’d make a cosmic combination
for sure!

We should team up together! That sounds like it
would be so much fun!

What’s the matter, Rayquaza? Are you curious
about Eternatus?
It’s acting like it does when it sees a meteorite...

Oh, is Rayquaza attracted to meteorites?
Interesting...

They say that Eternatus arrived to the planet inside
a meteorite that fell in ancient times!

Maybe it’s got a meteorite-like energy about it
because of that!
That would make sense...

In any case, it seems your partner has sparked
a flame within Rayquaza.
Shall we sate its curiosity with a battle?
I never refuse a challenge!

A legendary face-off between two Legendary
Pokémon... This ought to be good!
Sounds like Eternatus is keen as well!

Come on, Rayquaza! Let’s show these two how
strong we are!
I assume you came to watch the gala?
Pshh, I couldn’t care less about it.

But my Rayquaza here seems to be very interested
in yours.

What a coincidence. My Rayquaza seems quite
interested in yours as well.

Maybe it’s natural for Rayquaza to be drawn to
other Rayquaza.
Who knows?

Appearance isn’t everything. They could look
totally different from one another and still be
drawn to each other.
True... You may be right about that.
Well, good talk. I’ve got places to be...

But you’ve only just arrived! Why not stay and
enjoy the gala for a while?
Listen. I’m not here to make friends, all right?

But there is something we’re gonna need to clear
up here pretty soon.

And that’s which one of our Rayquaza is stronger.
And cooler.
I’ll be looking forward to it.
Rayquaza and I will blow your imagination away!
